text: John Robert Williamson (born 1887) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:Sportspeople from Gateshead Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:Stourbridge F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing
title: John Williamson (footballer, born 1887)
